about_the_game: Inanna travels through time and space to the planet of her ancestors to avoid chaos in the galaxies. Inanna must stop the interplanetary destruction that will trigger the end of time and uncover the truth about the past to secure her future. Make tough choices that have impacted not just you, but the entire galaxy in the past, present and future. Nibiru is an Arcade-Top Down Arena Shooter with a focus on narrative. Advance through hordes of enemies across the arena, collect powerful relics that augment and change Inanna's fighting style, fight in the material and astral world, face challenging bosses and defeat everyone in your path.
detailed_description: Inanna travels through time and space to the planet of her ancestors to avoid chaos in the galaxies. Inanna must stop the interplanetary destruction that will trigger the end of time and uncover the truth about the past to secure her future. Make tough choices that have impacted not just you, but the entire galaxy in the past, present and future. Nibiru is an Arcade-Top Down Arena Shooter with a focus on narrative. Advance through hordes of enemies across the arena, collect powerful relics that augment and change Inanna's fighting style, fight in the material and astral world, face challenging bosses and defeat everyone in your path.
name: NIBIRU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 2.93 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 5600+ 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

short_description: Inanna crosses space and time with a desire for reparation. With the destruction of a planet imminent, Inanna must stop the Grid from taking over everything. Nibiru is a top-down shooter with an engaging sci-fi story.
